# (PART) Foundations {-}

# Geographic data in R {#spatial-class}

```{r setup, echo=FALSE, results='hide'}
ex2 = tempfile(fileext = ".Rmd")
on.exit(unlink(ex2))
download.file("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Robinlovelace/geocompr/main/_02-ex.Rmd", ex2)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
res = knitr::knit_child(ex2, quiet = TRUE,
                        options = list(include = TRUE, message = FALSE))
cat(res, sep = '\n')
```
